text:
September 28, 1953
Memo
TO: Program Acceptance Committee
FROM: Harry Skoraia
jWBc
Graydon Ausrnus has pointed out that the program planning c’uties
of your committee were wrongly assumed by me—to be understood*
He has formalised a committee consisting of George Probst,
Frank Schooley, Parker Wheatley and himself to discuss program
possibilities for the coming year* Therefore disregard my
earlier letter and consider that a Program Planning Committee,
as such, exists*
Sorry for misunderstanding*
cc: The Board of Directors
Executive Committee
Program Planning Committee
H« B* McCarty
